info.name: Forced Yahei (for linux)
info.description: Force all fonts to Microsoft Yahei

style.css:
@-moz-document
domain("86zw.com"),
domain("baidu.com"),
domain("dmm.hk"),
domain("moka123.com"),
domain("oaixs.org"),
domain("ranwen.cc"),
domain("renren.com"),
domain("xsmi.net"),
domain("zongheng.com")
{
    *{font-family: Microsoft Yahei;}
}
